title: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent Java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB:
1) Open an existing Java file. 
2) Modify the Java file (e.g., move an existing class). 
3) Click the SaveAs icon, located next to the Save Icon. 
A dialog will appear. 
4) Browse for a valid container location. 
5) Type the filename, but ignore the file extension, as it is not requested. 
6) Click Ok. 
Observed Behavior: The Navigator has added the file in the specified location, but without any file extension.
EB: The file type/extension should be remembered and displayed correctly in the Navigator after using the SaveAs function.
SR:
